entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
